name: Shelter

additionalTooltips.title: Charged Echoes
additionalTooltips.description:
Add [corrupt] by playing [infused] cards. The Wurmkin use [corrupt] to power spells and abilities.

[corrupt] can exceed [emptycorrupt] but excess [corrupt] will be removed at end of turn.

cardLoreTooltips: Manufactured architecture within the cairns is scarce and any effort that could be used to carve out the walls of the Bogwurm is instead focused on the protection of Echoes and Kinstones. So, Wurmkin choose to dwell — if they rest at all — inside the discarded carapaces of Kinhost. The hard shell is preserved by the Echoes infused within it and ensure that the carapace remains sturdy long after other shells would grow brittle and crumble.
